PropertyValue.Value: select t.line_id, t.station_id, bsi.station_cn_name, t.device_id, t.status_value, decode(t.status_value, '00', '运营开始成功', '01', '运营开始中', '02', '运营开始失败', '03', '运营结束成功', '04', '运营结束中', '05', '运营结束失败') as status_value_name, t.operator_id, poi.operator_name, t.update_date, t.update_time from dev_run_status_detail t left join basi_station_info bsi on bsi.station_id = t.station_id left join priv_operator_info poi on poi.operator_id = t.operator_id
